title: Harmonic Lab — Tones, Ratios, Calm Resonance
summary: Teach and render musical intervals (432Hz grid) with ND-safe gains. Link color ↔ tone for synesthetic study.
safe_use: Never autoplay. Cap gain at 0.03. Respect system 'reduce motion/sounds'.
procedures: On user tap, ramp gain to ≤ nd_safe.gain_max; hold ≤ 2s; release.
Optionally tint the plate with a corresponding calm color.
references: Guido d’Arezzo (neumes), Paul Foster Case (tones for Tarot)
